scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Kelly Waldschmidt
scrape.text: I am not one that takes pleasure bashing a book, so it pains me a bit to admit how much I HATE this novel. I hate the timing of the narration, I hate the shift from present to past, past to present, I hate the unsaid details that the narrator claims were not important or were too personal, I HATE the end, I dislike all of the main characters and I feel like there were too many incomplete story lines built into this piece. I think maybe this story would have worked better either as a short story/novella, or as a lengthier book, but with a new organization and structure.
